attributes.action: Call for a national inquiry into the historic grooming gangs of Rochdale.
attributes.additional_details: A national inquiry ensure that lessons are learned to prevent such failures in the future. It is imperative to provide justice for survivors, hold perpetrators accountable, and implement robust safeguarding measures to protect vulnerable children across the UK.
attributes.background: This inquiry is essential to ensure accountability for individuals and institutions, to examine why victims were ignored or dismissed and to uncover the systemic failures that allowed these heinous crimes to persist.

rejection.details:
